Paragraph: A 47 - year - old man who had been taking minocycline for palmoplantar pustulosis developed fever , myalgias , polyneuropathy , and testicular pain , with elevated C - reactive protein ( CRP ) .

| Polyneuropathy (nerve damage) |
| Testicular pain |
